title: Transfer Between Accounts (request)
description: This call allows transfers between accounts held by a given user. Transfer funds between your fiat and cryptocurrency accounts (for a fee). Please note that account_from should be same as current authorized account.

transfer_between_accounts.description: If account_from or account_to is not provided, we'll just return available accounts.

accounts.description: Optional field to control the list of accounts returned when account_from or account_to is not provided. 'Brief' will only include standard trading accounts and can be faster.

passthrough.description: [Optional] Used to pass data through the websocket, which may be retrieved via the echo_req output field.

req_id.description: [Optional] Used to map request to response.
